dishes.dish_name: Grande Tagliere di Salumi e Formaggi
ingredients: Apricot mostarda (apricots, white sugar, chili flakes, water, mustard seed, white wine)
Truffle honey (Urbani black truffle carpaccio shaved truffles, Urbani fresh black winter truffles, Billy Bee honey)
Add on: half ball of fresh Mozzarella
Ragu Toscano/Fiorentino (Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, white onion, carrot, celery, red wine, water, tomato passata, fine sea salt, black pepper, rosemary, Woodward AAA beef chuck)
Fresh pasta dough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina)
Filling (Bella Casara ricotta, Grana Padano 12 month, ground baby spinach, fine sea salt)
Basic tomato sauce (peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil)
Plin masterdough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina, Molino Pasini type 00 flour)

Filling (veal breast, pork butt, generic rub [fine sea salt, brown sugar, black pepper, chili flakes, water], black kale, spanish onion, carrot, green cabbage, white wine, chicken stock [water, mirepoix, chicken bones, feet, and thighs], thyme, sage, bay leaves, spinach, Grana Padano 12 month, kosher salt, nutmeg)
Fresh pasta dough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina)

Filling (butternut squash, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, kosher salt, Grana Padano 12 month, fine sea salt, mostarda di cremona [peaches, pears, papaya, cherries, clementines, figs, kiwi, glucose syrup, sugar, glucose-fructose syrup, mustard seed, mustard flavor, acidifier: E330, Color: E127, Preservative: E220 {anhydride sulphurous}])
Parmigiano cream sauce (35% cream, Grana Padano 12 month, Parmigiano Reggiano 12 month)
Fresh pasta dough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina)

Truffle butter sauce (water, corn starch, Stirling Creamery unsalted butter, Parmigiano Reggiano 12 month, Gay Lea unsalted butter, Urbani truffle sauce with mushrooms, Urbani fresh burgundy truffles, Urbani black truffle carpaccio shaved truffles)
Potato gnocchi (riced russet potato, fine sea salt, rice flour, Molino Pasini type 00 flour)
Basil pesto (Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, basil, Grana Padano 12 month, Parmigiano Reggiano 12 month, Pecorino, pine nuts, fine sea salt, citric acid)
Potato gnocchi (riced russet potato, fine sea salt, rice flour, Molino Pasini type 00 flour)
Quattro formaggi sauce (milk, fine sea salt, Mascarpone, Gorgonzola Piccante DOP, Montasio, Grana Padano 12 month, water)
Potato gnocchi (riced russet potato, fine sea salt, rice flour, Molino Pasini type 00 flour)
Basic tomato sauce (peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil)

dishes.dish_name: Gnocchi con Ragu di Salsiccia e Funghi
ingredients: Potato gnocchi(riced russet potato, fine sea salt, rice flour, Molino Pasini type 00 flour)

norcina sauce(sweet & simple sausage [pork shoulder, fine sea salt, white sugar, black pepper, chili flakes, water], Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, garlic confit oil [garlic, canola oil], mushroom ragu [oyster, brown cremini, porcini, and button mushrooms, fine sea salt, water, thyme, rosemary, bay leaves, shallot confit{shallot, olive oil}, garlic confit{garlic, canola oil}, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, white wine], white wine, vegetable stock [water, bay leaves, thyme, spanish onion, carrot, celery], fine sea salt, black pepper, black truffle butter [unsalted butter, Urbani truffle sauce with mushrooms, black winter truffle], pork hog casings, porcini mushrooms)
Fresh pasta dough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina)

ragu bolognese(white onion, carrot, celery, bay leaves, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, pancetta, tomato paste, red wine, tomato passata, water, milk, fine sea salt, Duroc pork butt, Woodward AAA beef chuck)
Parmigiano Reggiano 24 month*dairy cannot be removed as there is milk in the bolognese sauce

scoglio base (soffritto di mare [anchovies, garlic, capers, chili flakes], Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, squid rings and tentacles, basic tomato sauce [peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil], water, white wine, gulf shrimp)

* “allo scoglio” means “of the rock” - fishermen used to add small seashore rocks to pots loaded with live shellfish and shake it, making the molluscs detach from their shells and become easier to eat
cacio e pepe sauce (water, Pecorino Romano DOP, cornstarch, black pepper)
Fresh pasta dough (eggs, water, durum wheat semolina)
bechamel sauce (milk, all-purpose flour, black pepper, bay leaves, unsalted butter, fine sea salt)
basic tomato sauce (peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil)

ragu bolognese (white onion, carrot, celery, bay leaves, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, pancetta, tomato paste, red wine, tomato passata, water, milk, fine sea salt, Duroc pork butt, Woodward AAA beef chuck)
carbonara base (eggs, Pecorino Romano DOP, guanciale fat, black pepper)
Master Dough (Mulino Marino Buratto flour, Mulino Marino type 0 flour, Mother Yeast, Old Dough, fine sea salt, Fresh Eagle yeast, water)
Focaccia Genovese Dough (Mulino Marino Flour Type 0, Olitalia European Oil Blend, fine sea salt, Fresh Eagle yeast, water, Diastatic Malt Flour, Olitalia EVOO)
Salamoia* (Olitalia European Oil Blend, water, fine sea salt, Olitalia EVOO)
*salamoia is a brine, squeezed on top of the focaccia
Focaccia Genovese Dough (Mulino Marino Flour Type 0, Olitalia European Oil Blend, fine sea salt, Fresh Eagle yeast, water, Diastatic Malt Flour, Olitalia EVOO)
Salamoia (Olitalia European Oil Blend, water, fine sea salt, Olitalia EVOO)

Tomato Risotto Mix (Basic Tomato sauce [peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil], water, Gay Lea unsalted butter, fine sea salt, Mozzarella, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, Arborio rice)
prosecco vinaigrette (champagne vinegar, honey, Dijon mustard, black pepper, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, fine sea salt, Frienn oil*)
Whipped ricotta (Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, Bella Casara Ricotta, milk, fine sea salt)
Cooked Marinated Beets (red agrodolce [red wine vinegar, sugar], peeled beets, water)
*alcohol cannot be removed as beets are pre-marinated
anchovy vinaigrette (Recca anchovy pieces in sunflower oil, lemon juice, mint, shallot, Olitalia Olive Oil Blend, garlic, water)
dishes.special_note: *This salad is not vegetarian because of the dressing

dishes.dish_name: Bruschetta con Ricotta Miele e Tartufo
ingredients: truffle honey (Urbani black truffle carpaccio shaved truffles, Urbani fresh black winter truffles, Billy Bee honey)

Meatballs (Duroc pork butt, Woodward AAA beef brisket, milk, egg, ricotta, garlic confit [garlic, canola oil], fine sea salt, black pepper, Parmigiano Reggiano 12 month, Grana Padano 12 month, parsley, breadcrumbs, water)
Basic tomato sauce (peeled Mutti tomatoes, Olitalia Blend Olive Oil, coarse sea salt, water, basil)
Lucious glaze (sugar, stone-ground IGP Piemontese hazelnuts, whole almonds)
sweet Italian sausage (pork, water, salt, spices, sugar, sodium erythorbate, sodium nitrite)
Artichokes (sunflower oil, spices, white wine vinegar, salt, antioxidizer: E300, acidity regulator: E330)
sweet Italian sausage (pork, water, salt, spices, sugar, sodium erythorbate, sodium nitrite)
Budino al cioccolato (54.5% semi-sweet callet*, 35% heavy cream, whole milk, granulated sugar, egg yolks, kosher salt)
devil food cake (all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, kosher salt, rice bran oil, eggs)
sette vele glaze (granulated sugar, 35% cream, cocoa powder, 70% bittersweet callet)
feuillettine bark (70% bittersweet callet, rice bran oil, Cacao Barry pailleté feuilletine**)
Nonna Cream (eggs, Mauri mascarpone, granulated sugar)
ladyfingers (sugar, glucose syrup, enriched wheat flour, liquid whole egg, ammonium bicarbonate, sodium bicarbonate, sodium acid pyrophosphate, natural flavor)

dishes.dish_name: Panna Cotta ai Frutti di Bosco | Dolci
ingredients: Panna Cotta Classica (granulated sugar, whole milk, gelatin sheets, 35% cream, Bacardi rum)
almond streusel (confectioners sugar, almond flour, unsalted butter, rice flour, kosher salt, cinnamon)
blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, sugar sweet new snow*

dishes.dish_name: Panna Cotta al Pistacchio e Albicocche | Dolci
ingredients: Panna Cotta Classica (granulated sugar, whole milk, gelatin sheets, 35% cream, Bacardi rum)
pistachio paste, pistachio streusel (confectioners sugar, unsalted butter, pistachio paste, rice flour, shelled raw pistachios, almond flour, kosher salt)
gelee alle albicocca (apricot puree, granulated sugar, gelatin sheets, dextrose, lemon juice)
Cannoli shells (Flour type 00, high oleic sunflower oil, water, Manitoba flour type 0, lard, wine, granulated sugar, egg whites, vanilla, cinnamon)
hulled raw pistachios, 70% bittersweet chocolate callet

dishes.dish_name: Coppa con Cioccolato e Nocciola | Dolci
ingredients: Cioccolato gelato (whole milk, granulated sugar, bittersweet 70% chocolate callet, pure cocoa liquor, dextrose, neutro stabilizer, 35% heavy cream, skim milk powder, invert sugar medium)
nocciola gelato (whole milk, granulated sugar, dextrose, egg yolks, neutro stabilizer, skim milk powder, hazelnut paste)
candied hazelnuts (roasted hazelnuts, granulated sugar, water)
cantucci mandorle e cioccolato (unsalted butter, granulated sugar, eggs, unbleached flour, baking powder, kosher salt, raw almonds, 54.5% semi-sweet chocolat callet)

dishes.dish_name: Coppa con Lampone e Limone | Dolci
ingredients: Sorbetto al Limone (liquid sugar [granulated sugar, dextrose, powdered glucose, water], neutro stabilizer, lemon juice, lemon zest)
ladyfingers (liquid sugar [granulated sugar, dextrose, powdered glucose, water], citric acid, neutro stabilizer, raspberry puree)
Fior di latte gelato (granulated sugar, dextrose, neutro stabilizer, whole milk, skim milk powder, 35% heavy cream)
